name: The Adventures of Jason and the Argonauts
name_original: The Adventures of Jason and the Argonauts
description:
This exciting Match 3 adventure game takes you on a journey beyond the edge of the world. Join ancient Greek heroes in search of the Golden Fleece. Choose your own level of challenge with or without time limitation. Play swap, chain and group levels of Match 3 and enjoy various mini games through 9 chapters and 90 levels of the mythical adventure...

- Take part in 9 chapters of the mythical adventure
- Play 90 exciting levels
- Enjoy a diversity of puzzles in every chapter
- Swap, group and chain Match 3 levels
- Choose one of 3 modes of difficulty
- Design an ancient city
- Win favor of the Gods of the Olympus
